mapper.select: select visitor_id,visitor_name,visitor_sex,visitor_call, reason , bedroom_name , DATE_FORMAT(visitor_date,'YYYY-mm-dd hh24:MM:ss') as visitor_date from visitor where 1=1 and visitor_date >= (sysdate -#{arg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and bedroom_name = #{arg2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and reason like #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by visitor_date desc

SELECT r.visitor_id,r.visitor_name,r.visitor_sex,r.visitor_call, r.reason , r.bedroom_name , r.visitor_date FROM ( SELECT tt.*, @ROWNUM AS rowno FROM ( select visitor_id,visitor_name,visitor_sex,visitor_call, reason , bedroom_name , DATE_FORMAT(visitor_date,'YYYY-mm-dd hh24:MM:ss') as visitor_date from visitor where 1=1 and visitor_date >= (sysdate -#{params.arg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and bedroom_name = #{params.arg2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and reason like #{params.key,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by visitor_date desc
)tt WHERE #{pageSize}*#{pageNo} >=@ROWNUM ) r WHERE r.rowno >= #{pageSize}*(#{pageNo}-1) +1

select visitor_id,visitor_name,visitor_sex,visitor_call, reason , bedroom_name , DATE_FORMAT(visitor_date,'YYYY-mm-dd hh24:MM:ss') as visitor_date from visitor where 1=1 and visitor_id = #{visitorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into visitor (visitor_id,visitor_name,visitor_sex,visitor_call, reason , bedroom_name ,visitor_date) values (#{visitorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{visitorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitorSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{visitorCall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bedroomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate )
